title: I'm really confused on how I'm not able to climb
body: I'm not saying i should be pushed to diamond but seriously, This season i've got 1050 ranked games and still silver :C because i find normals just have trolls and feeders in it. I main top lane most of the time but primarliy I'll end up filling. What am i doing wrong in approaching my games?

replies.body:
> What am i doing wrong in approaching my games?

Well, for starters, assuming you'll climb *just* by playing games. Keep that "This season i've got 1050 ranked games and still silver" mentality out of it because that's not going to help you one bit.

Hi, 
I just wanted to say that the most important thing is your mentality.
League of Legends is a game. You play it to have fun.
Before criticising other players's mistakes, **look at yourself first**.

If you are getting below 70cs @10min, you should try to improve rather than criticising teammates for giving up a kill. Note: **14CS = 1 Kill**.
Also, normals is a game where people to mess around, practise new champions/builds, have fun. If the enemy top laner is better, then your top laner's score would look really bad. Don't blame your teammates.

Always look at your games positively, and always look for opportunities to win.
Remember, if you have the skill of a gold-tier player, you **will** get there.

Good Luck,
flamingsword2

Biggest thing for silver is this.

If you have a lead, SNOWBALL IT, Roam, force teamfights, actually win the game.

well its only silver so probs just pick stuff that can abuse enemy teams mistakes really well so stuff like vlad, riven, ryze and rumble where if they position poorly youll solo ace them : ) u can play aatrox pretty well but tbh that champ is garbo outside of lane phase

because you need to win 3 games for every loss to go anywhere, riot thought it would be funny to do that.

Also, bronze and silver people have a lot of trouble keeping with the pressure of split pushing, if you can have a team that can distract or 4v5 easily, you get the 5th wheel to split, causing the enemy confusion, as whether to fight your team of 4, break 1 or 2 off to stop you, increasing their chance to lose the team fight,  all going after you, allowing the team of 4 to push.

Good split push champions are:
mid: Zed, Viktor, Diana and Talon(they may not seem it, but they actually really are, Vik, with 200 ap and a lich bane, do not under estimate the rate he can kill towers, although i would keep him in the teamfight, he does too much aoe damage for the team to afford losing + his escape isnt too reliable if their whole team comes without warning, Diana, same deal as viktor, her passive is effective taking towers, but has to either kill her enemies or leave before they arrive and talon q is a free 200-300 bonus damage to the tower every 3 seconds, and he can escape well.)
top: Jax, Trynd, Fiora , Nasus
jungle: Shaco, Xin Zhao, Vi, lee (if you make good use of his passive) and Master yi
support: people who enhance attack damage or speed, such as Janna, though i don't recommend taking out the supp to split
adc: same as supp, don't recommend doing it if you need team fights, but jinx and Tristana are really good at it, and in right circumstances (good use of passive and w, sheen is good with it too) ezreal

in other words, lower elo struggle with people split pushing well, split pushers also usually get large amounts of cs, being loaded with gold to buy items.
